analysis.description: YoLoCoin.isContract (/unique_chucks/38/0x4c54ebf7f5199bd7e7a04d9a3f02340c9bd75ced.sol#317-326) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/38/0x4c54ebf7f5199bd7e7a04d9a3f02340c9bd75ced.sol:
	Contract YoLoCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/38/0x4c54ebf7f5199bd7e7a04d9a3f02340c9bd75ced.sol#168)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
